info.title: osu! Tournament Rating API
info.description: The official resource for reading and writing data within the osu! Tournament Rating platform.

get.summary: Get a beatmap by versatile search
get.description:
Get a beatmap searching first by id, then by osu! beatmap id

Requires Authorization:

Claim(s): admin

404.description: If a beatmap for the search key does not exist

post.summary:
Filter a list of users based on the criteria as described in
API.DTOs.FilteringResultDTO

400.description: Errors encountered during validation

post.summary: Creates an admin note for a game

404.description: If a game matching the given id does not exist

400.description: If the authorized user does not exist

get.summary: List all admin notes from a game

404.description: If a game matching the given id does not exist

200.description: Returns all admin notes from a game

patch.summary: Updates an admin note for a game

404.description:
If a game matching the given id does not exist.
If an admin note matching the given noteId does not exist

403.description: If the requester did not create the admin note

delete.summary: Deletes an admin note for a game

404.description:
If a game matching the given id does not exist.
If an admin note matching the given noteId does not exist
If the provided id does not belong to a game

400.description: If JsonPatch data is malformed

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The zero-indexed page offset. Page 0 returns the first PageSize results.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of elements to return per page

parameters.name: ChartType
parameters.description: Defines whether the leaderboard should be global or filtered by country

If a match matching the given id does not exist.
If an admin note matching the given noteId does not exist

delete.summary: Deletes an admin note for a match

If a match matching the given id does not exist.
If an admin note matching the given noteId does not exist

get.description:
Results are ordered by id and support pagination. All match data is included.

Requires Authorization:

Claim(s): user, client

parameters.name: Ruleset
parameters.description:
Filters results for Database.Entities.Matches with a
matching Database.Enums.Ruleset

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
Filters results for Database.Entities.Matches with a partially
matching Database.Entities.Match.Name

parameters.name: DateMin
parameters.description:
Filters results for Database.Entities.Matches with a
Database.Entities.Match.StartTime greater than this value

parameters.name: DateMax
parameters.description:
Filters results for Database.Entities.Matches with an
Database.Entities.Match.EndTime less than this value

parameters.name: VerificationStatus
parameters.description:
Filters results for Database.Entities.Matches with a
matching Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus

parameters.name: RejectionReason
parameters.description: Filters results for Database.Entities.Matches with a matching Database.Enums.Verification.MatchRejectionReason

parameters.name: ProcessingStatus
parameters.description: Filters results for Database.Entities.Matches with a matching Database.Enums.Verification.MatchProcessingStatus

parameters.name: SubmittedBy
parameters.description:
Filters results for Database.Entities.Matches where the id of the
Database.Entities.User that submitted it matches this value

parameters.name: VerifiedBy
parameters.description:
Filters results for Database.Entities.Matches where the id of the
Database.Entities.User that verified it matches this value

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description: Controls the manner in which results are sorted

parameters.name: SortDescending
parameters.description: Denotes whether to sort results in ascending or descending order

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Controls the number of matches to return. Functions as a "page size".
Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 1, Maximum 5000

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Controls which block of size limit to return.
Default: 1, Constraints: Minimum 1

200.description: Returns the desired page of matches

404.description: If a match does not exist for the given id
If the provided id does not belong to a match

400.description: If JsonPatch data is malformed

get.summary: Get the currently logged in user

200.description: Returns the currently logged in user

get.summary: Get player stats for the currently logged in user
get.description:
If no ruleset is provided, the player's default is used. Database.Enums.Ruleset.Osu is used as a fallback.
If a ruleset is provided but the player has no data for it, all optional fields of the response will be null.
API.DTOs.PlayerStatsDTO.PlayerInfo will always be populated as long as a player is found.
If no date range is provided, gets all stats without considering date

Requires Authorization:

Claim(s): user

200.description: Returns the currently logged in user's player stats

post.summary: Update the ruleset for the currently logged in user

400.description: If the operation was not successful

post.summary: Sync the ruleset of the currently logged in user to their osu! ruleset

400.description: If the operation was not successful

post.summary: Authorize using an osu! authorization code

401.description: If there was an error during authorization

400.description: If there was an error during authorization

post.description:
Client secret is only returned from creation.
The user will have to reset the secret if they lose access.

Requires Authorization:

Claim(s): user

post.summary: Generate new access credentials from a valid refresh token
post.description:
Generated access credentials will contain only a new access token,
and the given refresh token is returned with it

400.description: If the given refresh token is invalid, or there was an error during authorization

200.description: Returns access credentials containing a new access token

get.summary: Search for tournaments, matches, and users
get.description:
Allows for partial or full searching on the names of tournaments, matches, and usernames

Requires Authorization:

Claim(s): user

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: The string to match against names of tournaments, matches, and usernames

200.description: Returns a list of all possible tournaments, matches, and usernames for the given search key

get.description:
Gets player by versatile search.
If no ruleset is provided, the player's default is used. Database.Enums.Ruleset.Osu is used as a fallback.
If a ruleset is provided but the player has no data for it, all optional fields of the response will be null.
API.DTOs.PlayerStatsDTO.PlayerInfo will always be populated as long as a player is found.
If no date range is provided, gets all stats without considering date

Requires Authorization:

Claim(s): user, client

404.description: If a player does not exist

get.summary: Get all tournaments which fit an optional request query

parameters.name: Verified
parameters.description: Whether the tournaments must be verified

parameters.name: Ruleset
parameters.description: An optional ruleset to filter by

200.description: Returns all tournaments which fit the request query

400.description:
If the given !:tournamentSubmission is malformed or
if a tournament matching the given name and ruleset already exists

201.description: Returns location information for the created tournament

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description:
If true, specifically includes verified match data. If false,
            includes all data, regardless of verification status.
            Also includes all child navigations if false.
            Default true (strictly verified data with limited navigation properties)

404.description: If a tournament matching the given id does not exist
If the provided id does not belong to a tournament

400.description: If JsonPatch data is malformed

404.description: The tournament does not exist

get.summary: List all matches from a tournament

404.description: If a tournament matching the given id does not exist

200.description: Returns all matches from a tournament

404.description: If a user does not exist

requestBody.description: List of scopes to assign to the user

404.description: If a user does not exist

400.description: If any of the given scopes are invalid, or the update was not successful

404.description: If a user does not exist
If a user does not exist

400.description: If the operation was not successful

get.description:
All users have access to clients that they own. Admin users have access to clients from any user.

Requires Authorization:

Policy: AccessUserResources

404.description: If a user does not exist

200.description: Returns a list of OAuth clients

delete.description:
All users have access to delete clients that they own.
Admin users have access to clients from any user.

Requires Authorization:

Policy: AccessUserResources

404.description: If a user or client does not exist

400.description: If the deletion was not successful

post.summary: Reset the secret of a user's OAuth client
post.description:
All users have access to reset secrets of clients that they own.
Admin users have access to clients from any user.

Requires Authorization:

Policy: AccessUserResources

404.description: If a user or client does not exist

400.description: If the secret reset was not successful

200.description: Returns new client credentials if the secret reset was successful

accessExpiration.description: Lifetime of the access token in seconds

refreshExpiration.description: Lifetime of the refresh token in seconds

AccessCredentialsDTO.description: Represents access credentials and their expiry

id.description: The id of the admin note

updated.description: Timestamp of the last update, if available

AdminNoteDTO.description: Represents a note for an entity created by an admin

averageMatchCostAggregate.description: The player's average match cost during the period

highestRating.description: The peak rating achieved by the player during the period

ratingGained.description: The amount of rating gained from the start of the period to the end of the period

gamesWon.description: The amount of games won during the period

gamesLost.description: The amount of games lost during the period

gamesPlayed.description: The amount of games played during the period

matchesWon.description: The amount of matches won during the period

matchesLost.description: The amount of matches lost during the period

matchesPlayed.description: The amount of matches played during the period

gameWinRate.description: A value between 0 and 1 representing the player's game win rate during the period

matchWinRate.description: A value between 0 and 1 representing the player's match win rate during the period

averageTeammateRating.description: The average rating of the player's teammates during the period. This average does not include the player's own rating

averageOpponentRating.description: The average rating of the player's opponents during the period

bestWinStreak.description: The most amount of matches won in a row during the period

matchAverageScoreAggregate.description:
Across all matches the player has played in, the average score across the entire lobby. This average includes
scores for games the player may have not been in for

matchAverageMissesAggregate.description: Across all matches the player has played in, the average miss count of the lobby, across all games in that match

matchAverageAccuracyAggregate.description: Across all matches the player has played in, the average accuracy of the lobby, across all games in that match

averageGamesPlayedAggregate.description: The amount of maps the player participates in, on average.

averagePlacingAggregate.description:
The average lobby ranking the player has on maps they participate in.
A top-score is 1, bottom score would be team size * 2

periodStart.description: The beginning of the period for which the statistics are calculated.

periodEnd.description: The end of the period for which the statistics are calculated.

AggregatePlayerMatchStatsDTO.description: Represents an aggregate of match statistics for a player during a period of time

routeValues.description: Any route or query parameters that must be included in the URI

action.description: The controller method that produces the resource

controller.description: The controller that produces the resource

FilteringFailReason.description: Explains why the player failed filtering
x-enumDescriptions: The player passed filtering, thus there is no failure reason
The player does not have a rating / profile in the o!TR database
The player's rating is below the minimum threshold
The player's rating is above the maximum threshold

The player is provisional and the filtering criteria specifies
exclusion of provisional players

The player has not played in the minimum specified
amount of tournaments
The player's all-time peak rating is above the maximum allowed
The player has not played in the minimum specified amount of matches

minRating.description: Players with a current rating below this value will be filtered

maxRating.description: Players with a current rating above this value will be filtered

allowProvisional.description: Whether to filter players that currently have a provisional rating

tournamentsPlayed.description:
If set, requires players to have participated in at least
this many distinct tournaments

peakRating.description:
If set, requires players to have an all-time peak rating less than
this value

matchesPlayed.description:
If set, requires players to have played in at least
this many matches

osuPlayerIds.description: A list of osu! player ids that will be filtered

FilteringRequestDTO.description:
Represents a set of criteria used by the API.Controllers.FilteringController
to determine player eligibility for a tournament

FilteringResult.description: Indicates whether a player passed or failed filtering
x-enumDescriptions: Indicates the player passed filtering
Indicates the player failed filtering

playersPassed.description: The number of players who passed filtering

playersFailed.description: The number of players who failed filtering

filteringResults.description:
A collection of filtering results, one per submitted player,
in the same order as submitted in the API.DTOs.FilteringRequestDTO

FilteringResultDTO.description: Represents a filterings result for a collection of players

startTime.description: Timestamp of the beginning of the game

endTime.description: Timestamp of the end of the game

GameDTO.description: Represents a single game (osu! beatmap) played in a match

GameProcessingStatus.description: The status of a Database.Entities.Game in the processing flow
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.Game needs automation checks

The Database.Entities.Game is awaiting verification from a
Database.Entities.User with verifier permission
The Database.Entities.Game needs stat calculation (Generates the Database.Entities.GameWinRecord)
The Database.Entities.Game has completed all processing steps

GameRejectionReason.description: The reason why a Database.Entities.Game is rejected
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.Game is not rejected
The Database.Entities.Game's osu! API data did not contain any Database.Entities.GameScores
The Database.Entities.Game has invalid mods applied
The Database.Entities.Game's Database.Enums.Ruleset does not match that of the parent Database.Entities.Tournament
The Database.Entities.Game's Database.Enums.ScoringType is not Database.Enums.ScoringType.ScoreV2
The Database.Entities.Game's Database.Enums.TeamType is not Database.Enums.TeamType.TeamVs

The Database.Entities.Game's Database.Enums.TeamType is not Database.Enums.TeamType.TeamVs
and attempting Database.Enums.TeamType.TeamVs conversion was not successful

The Database.Entities.Game's number of Database.Entities.Game.Scores with a Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus
of Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.Verified or Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.PreVerified is < 2

The Database.Entities.Game's number of Database.Entities.Game.Scores with a Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus
of Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.Verified or Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.PreVerified divided by 2 is
not equal to the Database.Entities.Tournament.LobbySize of the parent Database.Entities.Tournament
The Database.Entities.Game's Database.Entities.Game.EndTime could not be determined
The Database.Entities.Match the Database.Entities.Game was played in was rejected

playerId.description: The id of the Player this score belongs to

GameWarningFlags.description:
Warnings for irregularities in Database.Entities.Game data that don't warrant an automatic
Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus of Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.PreRejected
but should have attention drawn to them during manual review
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.Game has no warnings

If the parent Database.Entities.Tournament does not have a submitted pool of
Database.Entities.Beatmaps, and the Database.Entities.Game's Database.Entities.Game.Beatmap
is played only once throughout the entire Database.Entities.Tournament

If the parent Database.Entities.Tournament has a submitted pool of Database.Entities.Beatmaps,
the Database.Entities.Game's Database.Entities.Game.Beatmap is not a part of the pool,
and the Database.Entities.Game is not one of the first two in the Database.Entities.Match

minMatches.description: The minimum number of matches played (ranges from 1-10000)

maxMatches.description: The maximum number of matches played (ranges from 1-10000)

LeaderboardPlayerInfoDTO.description: Individual line items in the leaderboard

LeaderboardTierFilterDTO.description:
A collection of booleans representing which tiers to filter.
            
False = Default, no behavioral change
True = Explicitly included in leaderboard results
            
If *all* tiers are set to false, or all tiers are set to true, the leaderboard will return
as if no tier filters were applied.
            
For example, if Bronze and Emerald are true and everything else is false,
then only Bronze and Emerald players will show up in the leaderboard
(specifically, Bronze III-I and Emerald III-I)

location.description: URL of where the new resource can be accessed

lastProcessingDate.description: Timestamp of the last time the match was processed

games.description: List of games played during the match

next.description: Link to the next potential page of results

previous.description: Link to the previous potential page of results

MatchDTOPagedResultDTO.description: Represents a paged list of results

MatchProcessingStatus.description: The status of a Database.Entities.Match in the processing flow
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.Match needs data requested from the osu! API
The Database.Entities.Match needs automation checks

The Database.Entities.Match is awaiting verification from a
Database.Entities.User with verifier permission
The Database.Entities.Match needs stat calculation (Generates the Database.Entities.MatchWinRecord and Database.Entities.PlayerMatchStats)
The Database.Entities.Match is awaiting rating processor data (Generates all Database.Entities.Processor.RatingAdjustments)
The Database.Entities.Match has completed all processing steps

MatchRejectionReason.description: The reason why a Database.Entities.Match is rejected
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.Match is not rejected
The osu! API returned invalid data or no data for the Database.Entities.Match
The osu! API returned no Database.Entities.Games for the Database.Entities.Match
The Database.Entities.Match's Database.Entities.Match.Name does not follow tournament lobby title conventions

The Database.Entities.Match's !:Entities.Games were eligible for Database.Enums.TeamType.TeamVs
conversion and attempting Database.Enums.TeamType.TeamVs conversion was not successful

The Database.Entities.Match has no Database.Entities.Match.Games with a Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus
of Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.Verified or Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.PreVerified

The Database.Entities.Match's number of Database.Entities.Match.Games with a Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus
of Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.Verified or Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.PreVerified is not an odd number
(does not satisfy "best of X")
The Database.Entities.Match's Database.Entities.Match.EndTime could not be determined
The Database.Entities.Tournament the Database.Entities.Match was played in was rejected

osuId.description: osu! match id of the match

MatchSearchResultDTO.description: Represents a search result for a match

osuId.description: osu! match id of the match

created.description: Date that the match was submitted

updated.description: Date that the match was last updated

MatchSubmissionStatusDTO.description: Represents the status of a submitted match

MatchWarningFlags.description:
Warnings for irregularities in Database.Entities.Match data that don't warrant an automatic
Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus of Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.PreRejected
but should have attention drawn to them during manual review
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.Match has no warnings

The Database.Entities.Match's Database.Entities.Match.Name does not follow common tournament
lobby title conventions
The Database.Entities.Match's number of Database.Entities.Match.Games is exactly 3 or 4

MatchesQuerySortType.description: Denotes which property a query for !:Database.Entities.Matches will be sorted by
x-enumDescriptions: Sort by primary key
Sort by osu! id
Sort by start start time
Sort by end time

ModStatsDTO.description:
Represents some information about a player's mod stats.
e.g. how many times has the player played/won with some mod?

x-enumDescriptions: No mods enabled
No fail (NF)
Easy (EZ)
Touch Device (TD)
Hidden (HD)
Hard Rock (HR)
Sudden Death (SD)
Double Time (DT)
Relax (RX)
Half Time (HT)
Nightcore (NC) (Only set along with DoubleTime. i.e: NC only gives 576)
Flashlight (FL)
Autoplay (AT)
Spun Out (SO)
Autopilot (AP) (Autopilot)
Perfect (PF) (Only set along with Database.Enums.Mods.SuddenDeath. i.e: PF only gives 16416)
Denotes mods that are ineligible for ratings
4 key (4K) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
5 key (5K) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
6 key (6K) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
7 key (7K) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
8 key (8K) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
Fade In (FI) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
Denotes mods that directly impose a modifier on score
Random (RD) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
Cinema (CM)
Target Practice (TP)
9 Key (9K) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
Co-op (CO) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
1 Key (1K) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
3 Key (3K) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
2 Key (2K) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)
Denotes mods that are Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther key modifiers (See https://osu.ppy.sh/wiki/en/Gameplay/Game_modifier/xK)
Denotes mods that are available to use during Free Mod settings
Score v2 (SV2)
Mirror (MR) (Applicable only to Database.Enums.Ruleset.ManiaOther)

scopes.description: List of permissions granted to the client

OAuthClientCreatedDTO.description: Represents a created OAuth client (The only time the client secret is available is when a new client is created)

scopes.description: List of permissions granted to the client

userId.description: Id of the associated user, if available

playerId.description: The id of the player, if found

username.description: The username of the player, if found

osuId.description: The osu! id of the player

playerId.description: Id of the teammate or opponent

osuId.description: osu! id of the teammate or opponent

username.description: osu! username of the teammate or opponent

frequency.description: Number of times this teammate or opponent has played with the player

PlayerFrequencyDTO.description: Represents a player in the context of a teammate or opponent of another player

PlayerModStatsDTO.description: Represents counts of participation in games of differing mod combinations

chartData.description: List of data points used to construct the chart

PlayerRatingChartDTO.description: Represents data used to construct a rating delta chart for a player

ratingBefore.description: Rating of the player before this match occurred

ratingAfter.description: Rating of the player after this match occurred

volatilityBefore.description: Volatility of the player before this match occurred

volatilityAfter.description: Volatility of the player after this match occurred

ratingChange.description: Difference in rating for the player after this match occurred

volatilityChange.description: Difference in volatility for the player after this match occurred

isAdjustment.description: Indicates whether this data point is from a rating change that occurred outside of a match (i.e. decay)

PlayerRatingChartDataPointDTO.description: Represents a data point used to construct a rating chart for a player

adjustments.description: A collection of adjustments that describe the changes resulting in the final rating

isProvisional.description: Denotes the current rating as being provisional

PlayerRatingStatsDTO.description: Describes tournament rating based information for a player in a ruleset with additional statistics

rating.description: Rating of the player for the given ruleset

globalRank.description: Current global rank of the player for the given ruleset

ratingTier.description: Current rating tier of the player for the given ruleset

thumbnail.description: Link to an osu! thumbnail for the player

PlayerSearchResultDTO.description: Represents a search result for a player for a given ruleset

frequentTeammates.description: List of frequencies of the player's teammates

frequentOpponents.description: List of frequencies of the player's opponents

PlayerStatsDTO.description: Represents a collection of statistics for a player in a ruleset

countOther.description: Number of tournaments played outside of standard team sizes

PlayerTournamentLobbySizeCountDTO.description: Represents counts of participation in tournaments of differing team sizes

matchCost.description: Average match cost across the tournament for the player

PlayerTournamentMatchCostDTO.description: Represents match cost data across an entire tournament for a player

bestPerformances.description: List of best tournament performances for the player

recentPerformances.description: List of recent tournament performances for the player

PlayerTournamentStatsDTO.description: Represents statistics for a player regarding tournament participation and performance

ratingForNextTier.description: Rating required to reach next sub tier

ratingForNextMajorTier.description: Rating required to reach next major tier

nextMajorTier.description: Next major tier following current tier

subTierFillPercentage.description: Progress to the next sub tier as a percentage

majorTierFillPercentage.description: Progress to the next major tier as a percentage

permitLimit.description: The number of requests granted per window

window.description: The length of the window in seconds

RateLimitOverrides.description: Represents values used to override the default rate limit configuration

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the adjustment was applied

matchId.description: Id of the match the adjustment was created for if available

RatingAdjustmentDTO.description: Describes a single change to a PlayerRating

RatingAdjustmentType.description: Represents the different types of events that result in the generation of a Database.Entities.Processor.RatingAdjustment
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.Processor.RatingAdjustment is the initial rating
The Database.Entities.Processor.RatingAdjustment is the result of a period of inactivity (decay)
The Database.Entities.Processor.RatingAdjustment is the result of participation in a Database.Entities.Match
osu! (standard)
osu! Taiko
osu! Catch (aka Fruits)

osu! Mania (Encompasses all of the osu!mania ruleset and represents a ruleset that has
not yet been identified as either Database.Enums.Ruleset.Mania4k or Database.Enums.Ruleset.Mania7k)
osu! Mania 4k variant
osu! Mania 7k variant

ScoreProcessingStatus.description: The status of a Database.Entities.GameScore in the processing flow
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.GameScore needs automation checks

The Database.Entities.GameScore is awaiting verification from a
Database.Entities.User with verifier permission
The Database.Entities.GameScore has completed all processing steps

ScoreRejectionReason.description: The reason why a Database.Entities.GameScore is rejected
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.GameScore is not rejected
The Database.Entities.GameScore's Database.Entities.GameScore.Score is below the minimum threshold
The Database.Entities.GameScore was set with any Database.Enums.Mods.InvalidMods
The Database.Entities.GameScore's Database.Enums.Ruleset does not match that of the parent Database.Entities.Tournament
The Database.Entities.Game the Database.Entities.GameScore was set in was rejected

ScoringType.description: Represents the scoring method (win condition) for a Database.Entities.Game
x-enumDescriptions: Scoring based on Score v1
Scoring based on accuracy
Scoring based on combo
Scoring based on Score v2

tournaments.description: A collection of search results for tournaments matching the search query

matches.description: A collection of search results for matches matching the search query

players.description: A collection of search results for players matching the search query

SearchResponseCollectionDTO.description: Represents a collection of search results

Team.description: Represents the team a Database.Entities.Player was on when a Database.Entities.GameScore was set
x-enumDescriptions: No team
Team blue
Team red

TeamType.description: Represents the team type used for a Database.Entities.Game (See osu! wiki - Multiplayer)
x-enumDescriptions: Free for all
Free for all (Tag format) (All players play tag on the same beatmap)
Team red vs team blue
Team red vs team blue (Tag format)

forumUrl.description: The osu! forum post or wiki page this tournament is featured by (If both are present, the osu! forum post should be used)

rankRangeLowerBound.description: Lowest rank a player can be to participate

startTime.description: The start date of the first match

endTime.description: The end date of the last match

location.description: URL of where the new resource can be accessed

abbreviation.description:
Acronym / shortened name of the tournament
<example>For osu! World Cup 2023, this value would be "OWC23"</example>

forumUrl.description: The osu! forum post or wiki page this tournament is featured by (If both are present, the osu! forum post should be used)

rankRangeLowerBound.description: Lowest rank a player can be to participate

startTime.description: The start date of the first match

endTime.description: The end date of the last match

matches.description: All associated match data (Will be empty for bulk requests such as List)

adminNotes.description: All admin notes associated with the tournament

TournamentProcessingStatus.description: The status of a Database.Entities.Tournament in the processing flow
x-enumDescriptions:
The Database.Entities.Tournament is awaiting approval from a
Database.Entities.User with verifier permission (Functions as the entry point to the processing flow. No entities owned by a Database.Entities.Tournament
will advance through the processing flow until approved.)

The Database.Entities.Tournament has Database.Entities.Matches with a
Database.Enums.Verification.MatchProcessingStatus of Database.Enums.Verification.MatchProcessingStatus.NeedsData
The Database.Entities.Tournament needs automation checks

The Database.Entities.Tournament is awaiting verification from a
Database.Entities.User with verifier permission
The Database.Entities.Tournament needs stat calculation
The tournament has completed all processing steps

TournamentRejectionReason.description: The reason why a Database.Entities.Tournament is rejected
x-enumDescriptions: The Database.Entities.Tournament is not rejected

The Database.Entities.Tournament has no Database.Entities.Tournament.Matches with a
Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus of Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.Verified or Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.PreVerified

The Database.Entities.Tournament's number of Database.Entities.Tournament.Matches with a
Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus of Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.Verified or
Database.Enums.Verification.VerificationStatus.PreVerified is below 80% of the total

The Database.Entities.Tournament's win condition is not Database.Enums.ScoringType.ScoreV2 (Only assigned via a "rejected submission".
Covers cases such as gimmicky win conditions, mixed win conditions, etc)

The Database.Entities.Tournament's format is not suitable for ratings (Only assigned via a "rejected submission".
Covers cases such as excessive gimmicks, relax, multiple modes, etc)

The Database.Entities.Tournament's lobby sizes are not consistent. (Only assigned via a "rejected submission".
Covers cases such as > 2 teams in lobby at once, async lobbies, team size gimmicks, varying team sizes, etc)

The Database.Entities.Tournament's data is incomplete or not recoverable Covers cases where match links are lost to time, private, main sheet is deleted, missing rounds, etc. (Only assigned via a "rejected submission".
Covers cases where match links are lost to time / dead / private, main sheet is deleted, missing rounds, etc)

TournamentSearchResultDTO.description: Represents a search result for a tournament

abbreviation.description:
Acronym / shortened name of the tournament
<example>For osu! World Cup 2023, this value would be "OWC23"</example>

forumUrl.description: The osu! forum post advertising this tournament

rankRangeLowerBound.description: Lowest rank a player can be to participate in the tournament

beatmapIds.description: A collection of pooled osu! beatmap ids

lastLogin.description: Timestamp of the user's last login to the o!TR website
Timestamp of the user's last login to the o!TR website

scopes.description: List of permissions granted to the user

UserDTO.description: Represents user information including optional data

rulesetIsControlled.description: Denotes whether the associated user has overwritten their default ruleset (If false, the default ruleset is always the same as the user's default ruleset on the osu! website)

UserSettingsDTO.description: Represents user controlled settings for otr-web

VerificationStatus.description:
The verification status of a Database.Entities.Tournament,
Database.Entities.Match, Database.Entities.Game, or Database.Entities.GameScore
x-enumDescriptions: Verification status has not yet been assigned
The Data Worker has identified an issue during processing
The Data Worker has not identified any issues during processing
Determined to be unfit for ratings by manual review
Determined to be fit for ratings by manual review

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization using the Bearer scheme. Paste **ONLY** your JWT in the text box below

scopes.verifier: Role granted to users with permission to verify submission data.
scopes.submit: Role granted to users with permission to submit tournament data.
scopes.whitelist: Role granted to users and clients to allow access during times of restricted use.
